text: Purpurite is a mineral, manganese phosphate, MnPO4 with varying amounts of iron depending upon its source. It occurs in color ranges from brownish black via purple and violet to dark red. Purpurite forms a series with the iron- bearing endmember heterosite, FePO4. ==See also== *Manganese violet ==References == Category:Manganese(III) minerals Category:Iron(III) minerals Category:Phosphate minerals Category:Orthorhombic minerals
title: Purpurite
